metadata.title: CVE-2020-28948 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Archive_Tar through 1.4.10 allows an unserialization attack because phar: is blocked but PHAR: is not blocked.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-28948` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-pear - 1:1.10.9+submodules+notgz-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-pear package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.10.9+submodules+notgz-1ubuntu1').
